mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, PD_NUM, PD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, PD_REGIT_DATE, U_ID, PD_TITLE, DEAL_TYPE, DEAL_STATUS FROM TOTAL_PRODUCT_VIEW WHERE PD_NUM IS NOT NULL ORDER BY PD_REGIT_DATE DESC
SELECT PD_NUM, PD_ID, B_U_ID, BID_PRICE, BID_DATE, ADDRESS, BS_ID FROM DIRECT_BOX3_VIEW WHERE PD_NUM = #{pd_num} AND BS_ID IS NOT NULL

SELECT ROWNUM, PD_NUM, PD_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, PD_REGIT_DATE, U_ID, PD_TITLE, DEAL_TYPE, DEAL_STATUS FROM TOTAL_PRODUCT_VIEW WHERE PD_NUM IS NOT NULL AND CATEGORY_NAME = CATEGORY_NAME and CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchvalue} || '%' OR U_ID = U_ID and U_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchvalue} || '%' OR PD_TITLE = PD_TITLE and PD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchvalue} || '%'
